common.amenitiesIntro: Thoughtful touches already waiting when you arrive.

amenities.title: Private ensuite comfort
amenities.body: Start and end each day with a hot shower, fluffy towels and space that's yours alone.

amenities.title: Sea-view terrace mornings
amenities.body: Slide open the doors to a private terrace for espresso or sunset drinks overlooking Positano.

amenities.title: Cool and quiet nights
amenities.body: Individually controlled air-conditioning and blackout shutters keep the room calm even in August heat.

amenities.title: Great value, great location
amenities.body: One of our most affordable options sits right in the hostel heart — close to reception, the shared kitchen and fellow travellers.

amenities.title: Female-only floor
amenities.body: Room 3 is part of a women-only section of the hostel. The shared bathroom nearby is clean, well-stocked and exclusively for female guests.

amenities.title: Bunk privacy built in
amenities.body: Each bunk comes with privacy curtains, a personal reading light and charging sockets so you can settle in at any hour without disturbing neighbours.

amenities.title: Female-only space
amenities.body: A dedicated women-only dorm with its own shared bathroom — clean, well-maintained and reserved exclusively for female guests on this floor.

amenities.title: Room for everyone
amenities.body: Eight beds across four bunks means there is always someone to share a recommendation or a trip to the beach with, without the chaos of a larger mixed dorm.

amenities.title: Essentials at every bunk
amenities.body: Each bed has privacy curtains, a reading light and USB charging sockets so your phone is ready for tomorrow's adventures.

amenities.title: Sea-view terrace included
amenities.body: Step outside onto the shared terrace to take in panoramic views of Positano and the Tyrrhenian Sea — a backdrop most guests never want to leave.

amenities.title: Ensuite bathroom for the room
amenities.body: A private bathroom shared only among roommates means no morning queues and all the space you need to get ready at your own pace.

amenities.title: Social but comfortable
amenities.body: Six beds in an open layout with curtains, reading lights and charging points at every bunk — close enough to make friends, private enough to sleep well.

amenities.title: Terrace with Amalfi views
amenities.body: The shared sea-view terrace is steps from the room — perfect for sunrise stretches, evening aperitivo or simply watching the boats in the bay below.

amenities.title: Your own bathroom
amenities.body: The ensuite bathroom belongs to this room only, so you set the schedule for morning showers without ever waiting in line.

amenities.title: Flexible bed layout
amenities.body: Three bunk beds plus a single means solo travellers and pairs both fit naturally, each spot equipped with curtains, lights and charging sockets.

amenities.title: Garden-view retreat
amenities.body: A quiet outlook onto the hostel garden makes room 8 one of the calmest spots in the building — ideal for early risers or light sleepers.

amenities.title: Intimate female-only setting
amenities.body: With just two beds in a women-only environment, this is the closest hostel experience to having a private room — without the private-room price tag.

amenities.title: Shared bathroom nearby
amenities.body: A spotless female-only shared bathroom is just steps from the door, kept stocked and well-maintained throughout the day.

amenities.title: Ensuite for three
amenities.body: A private bathroom shared between just three guests means genuinely short queues and a relaxed morning routine — a rare luxury in hostel travel.

amenities.title: Courtyard calm
amenities.body: Facing inward over the hostel's sheltered courtyard, the room stays cooler and quieter than the seafront floors — a welcome escape after a full day of exploring.

amenities.title: Intimate group feel
amenities.body: Three single beds rather than bunks give the room a more relaxed layout — comfortable for solo travellers who appreciate a little extra floor space and light.

amenities.title: Ensuite for the whole dorm
amenities.body: Six guests share one bathroom and no one else — morning routines run smoother when the bathroom is yours and not the whole floor's.

amenities.title: Classic hostel atmosphere
amenities.body: A lively mixed dorm with three bunk beds is perfect for solo travellers ready to meet people from all over the world within their first hour of arriving.

amenities.title: Charged and ready
amenities.body: Each bunk includes a reading light, USB charging sockets and privacy curtains so you can power down on your own schedule even when the room is busy.

amenities.title: Terrace big enough for every roommate
amenities.body: Gather on outdoor sofas and tables to share breakfasts, stretch after hikes or capture the skyline together.

amenities.title: All-female comfort
amenities.body: A women-only dorm with ensuite bathroom and vanity space so you never queue for a shower.

amenities.title: Privacy and peace of mind
amenities.body: Each bunk includes curtains, reading lights, charging points and key-card lockers for valuables.

amenities.title: Extra-large shared terrace
amenities.body: Lounge chairs and dining space give your dorm a social living room with Amalfi Coast views.

amenities.title: Dedicated bathroom
amenities.body: Freshen up in a private bathroom stocked with hairdryers, mirrors and plenty of hooks.

amenities.title: Easy access to power
amenities.body: Each bed includes personal sockets, reading lights and key-card lockers for peace of mind.
